name: Yocto Build Tools
description: Installs Yocto Project build tools and dependencies for building embedded Linux distributions

version.description: Yocto/Poky version to prepare for (e.g., kirkstone, scarthgap, nanbield). This ensures compatible package versions are installed.

buildtoolsUrl.description: Optional URL to download and install Yocto buildtools tarball (e.g., buildtools-extended tarball for specific host distributions)

buildtoolsPath.description: Path where buildtools should be installed if buildtoolsUrl is provided

installDependencies.description: Install required build dependencies for Yocto (based on distribution)
